Reviews.Title: “Very nice in good location!”
Reviews.Author: mathelaci
Reviews.Content: Stayed here two nights in February 2012! Rooms are good size and very nice! Everything is very clean! Breakfast fantastic! Good location too and good value for money. Will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice club hotel, relaxed atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: GreatAL69
Reviews.Content: Very good location in Mitte. Nice stylish rooms. There is a very nice breakfast buffet, where they cook your eggs to order. Recommendable for couples or family.

Reviews.Title: “berlin jewel”
Reviews.Author: JoanFitzgScanlon
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for weekend of berlin Marathon. Staff very pleasant and allowed me check in and print off my boarding pass when leaving. Rooms pleasant and comfortable. Buffet breakfast ample to keep you going during the day. Directions from previous reviews good. Only one u bahn stop up from freidrichstrasse train station. Rooms clean and cosy. Really enjoyed my trip to berlin and would like to return

Reviews.Title: “We would recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: jmatts
Reviews.Content: A good location, quiet apart from the occasional outburst of church bells. The rooms were very comfortable and well appointed and the breakfast was good. Staff were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, clean, but note quite "4-star"”
Reviews.Author: whereshouldilive
Reviews.Content: I was lucky that I secured a hotel for my arrival on a Sat night - all hotels seemed booked due to a football match. But, Adelante responded to my request immediately and provided a good rate for my entire 4-day stay. Location is great off Torstrasse in a lovely Mitte section. It's a quiet residential street/area, but 5-10 minute walk to the Hackescher Market area (fun shops and restaurants) and Friedrichstrasse (main subway connection I used). There's also markets around to stock up on water, etc. For this, I consider the hotel a somewhat "hidden (no frills) gem." Rooms are large enough, and nice showers. Hotel overall is kept very clean. Quiet too, as I slept with windows open. Breakfast is a feast: eggs, sausage, smoked salmon, veggies, fruits, yoghurt, breads. there's a "lounge" in the basement that seemed nice - though, I never stopped in for a drink. Though Adelante advertises a "4-star" hotel - it's more of a 3 - 3.5 star. I give this rating because the internet didn't quite work/very slow connection in my room, and when I arrived, towels on the bathroom sink seemed damp. I was able to use a computer in the lobby, and they did call for a taxi (that accepts credit cards) on departure. Adelante seemed more accustomed to German business stays, rather than tourists as I sometimes had diifuculty communicating with the front desk about directions and services, etc. (I don't speak German.) Don't expect them to coordinate any tours for you - it's mainly a self-service. I've stayed in similar and nice 3-stars (no shame in that). For a short tourist stay (and if you're confident where your going) or business, Adelante is a good place.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and modern”
Reviews.Author: abbiati
Reviews.Content: Very nice and modern hotel. Big, spacious comfortable room, great modern bathroom, big flat screen tv. No wi-fi, but free lan connection, good breakfasts. Wait some time for reception for check-in, but its ok

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: Swedeflyer
Reviews.Content: The hotel is perfectly located in Mitte just a few blocks from Oranienburger Tor, a short walk from "everything" and located on a quiet and sleepy side street. The hotel is in a newbuilt building so everything still has that newbuilt glossy shine and and the rooms have air conditioning, solid walls and sound proof windows which makes for a good nights sleep without being disturbed by heat, neighbors or traffic noise. The room was clean, spacious and had everything you´d expect in a good standard class hotel room (tv, minibar, Ipod dock, new furnishings, good beds and so on) and the bathroom was big and spotless. Breakfast was a great buffet with both cold continental and hot english on offer. The staff were really helpful. All in all a really good, modern and clean hotel that gives you a good location, a good nights sleep and a good breakfast.
